clinical_study.brief_title: Open-label Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability and PK of BHV-0223 in ALS
clinical_study.official_title: Open-Label Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Multiple Doses of BHV-0223 in Subjects With Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis

brief_summary.textblock: Phase 1, open-label study of BHV-0223 in ALS.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a phase 1, open-label, single arm study to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of multiple doses of BHV-0223 in subjects with ALS.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (Safety and Tolerability)
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of treatment emergent adverse events (safety and tolerability) as measured through laboratory tests and physical exam findings.

secondary_outcome.measure: BHV-0223 Concentrations in Blood at Days 1, 29 and 57
secondary_outcome.description: BHV-0223 concentrations at days 1, 29 and 57 through blood collections at days 1, 29 and 57.

clinical_study.condition: Motor Neuron Disease, Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
clinical_study.keyword: Motor Neuron Disease, Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
